Nonso Amadi (amụrụ na Septemba 1, na afọ 1995) bụ onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-emepụta egwu na Naijiria. Ọ bụ onye na-ede egwu na onye na-emepụta egwu nke malitere ọrụ egwu ya na 2012, mgbe ọ nọ na Mahadum Ọgbụgba ndụ, ebe ọ gụrụ injinia kemịkal.
A mụrụ Nonso Amadi na Septemba 1, na afọ 1995, nne na nna ya bụ ndị Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye nke atọ n'ime ezinụlọ nke mmadụ asaa ma too na Naịjirịa tupu ọ kwaga United Kingdom
Ọ gara Chrisland College Idimu, Lagos ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afọ 2009
Ọ gụrụ injinia kemịkal na Mahadum Covenant, na na afọ 2014 ọ gara n'ihu na ọmụmụ ya na Mahadim Swansea United Kingdom
O nwere nzere masta na Mahadum McMaster, Canada.
